briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Dose Conversion From Vicodin® to Buprenorphine Transdermal System (Butrans™) in Subjects With OA Pain
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind Study Evaluating the Dose Conversion From Vicodin® to Buprenorphine Transdermal System (BTDS) in Subjects With Osteoarthritis (OA) Pain
summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of dose conversion from hydrocodone/ acetaminophen (Vicodin®) to the buprenorphine transdermal system (Butrans™) in subjects with osteoarthritis pain of the hip or knee. The double-blind treatment intervention duration is 2 weeks during which time supplemental analgesic medication will be allowed.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Percentage of Subjects Who Completed the 14-day Double-blind Phase.
